mapper.select: select id,student_name studentName,user_phone userPhone,pattern pattern,canal canal,class_hour classHour, school_name schoolName,enroll_state enrollState,course_hour courseHour,course_name courseName, is_delete isDelete,create_time createTime,update_time updateTime from t_enroll_info where is_delete=0 limit #{dataNum},#{limit}
select count(1) from t_enroll_info where is_delete = 0
